name: Red Hot Ginger
description:
DEFEND!!! Defend your home from the hoards of flaming food that are bent on destroying all you hold dear!!!!!! 

You play as JB, a gingerbread cookie, who has to defend his house from being burnt to the ground by flaming foods. Use your Frosting Gun and shot those flaming foodies to put out their fires and stop them in their tracks, but watch your ammo you only have so many shots before you run out and have to refill at the Frosting Bag. Also be sure to watch the damage meter on your house, if it gets completely destroyed Its Game Over.
